flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600>>600 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=168>>168 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600 - $150 = $<<600-150=449>>449 per head.
He would make $449 x 168 = $<<449*168=75432>>75432 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600 x 168 = $<<600*168=100800>>100800 at the original price.
He would lose $100800 - $75432 = $<<100800-75432=25368>>25368
#### 25368

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 450, not 449. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
